isPieceBlockingMe

public abstract boolean isPieceBlockingMe(Position ignoreIfPositionIsBlocked,
                                          Position ignoreIfPositionIsBlocked2)
Override this for moves depending on other pieces not standing in the way

Parameters:
ignoreIfPositionIsBlocked - this position should not be considered when checking for blocking pieces (i.e simulating a pass-through piece)
ignoreIfPositionIsBlocked2 - this position should not be considered when checking for blocking pieces (i.e simulating that the piece asking is hovering)
Returns:
true if this move isn't possible to do because of piece standing in the way

isTakeOverMove

public boolean isTakeOverMove()
Returns:
true if this move would take over one of the opponents pieces

getAffinity

public boolean getAffinity()
Returns:
the affinity of the piece making this move

getCurrentPosition

public Position getCurrentPosition()
Returns:
the current position of the piece that this move belongs to

getTakeOverValue

public int getTakeOverValue()
Returns:
the value of the piece at this move's destination

getRowChange

public byte getRowChange()
Returns:
A positive change means that the piece is moving upwards the board

getColumnChange

public byte getColumnChange()
Returns:
A positive change means that the piece is moving towards the right

getPositionIfPerformed

public Position getPositionIfPerformed()
Returns:
the new position or null if the move isn't valid

isMoveUnavailableDueToCheckMate

public boolean isMoveUnavailableDueToCheckMate(ChessBoard board)
This checks if the move would end in check mate, because no other piece stands in the path a check-mating move that this piece stops right now

makeMove

public void makeMove(ChessBoard board)
              throws UnavailableMoveException
Makes this move and updates all the moves of all the pieces that will need to be updated on the given board

Throws:
UnavailableMoveException - if this move isn't available right now

getAccumulatedTakeOverValuesForPieceAtDestination

public long getAccumulatedTakeOverValuesForPieceAtDestination()
Returns:
the sum of getTakeOverImportanceValue for all the pieces that can take over the piece at my destination

getOldPosition

public Position getOldPosition()
Returns:
if this move was the last one to be made this will return the position where the piece previously was at, if it wasn't the returned position will be erroronous
